amendment.description: At the end of subtitle F of title XI, insert the following: SEC. 116XX. CONSIDERATION OF THE TOTALITY OF CONSERVATION MEASURES. Section 7(b)(3) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1536(b)(3)) is amended by adding at the end the following: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 115-679 to require the Secretary to consider the totality of conservation measures already in place, or proposed, to mitigate species or habitat loss when determining whether Federal action is likely to jeopardize either.
